survey_content: Visit our fanpage facebook to receive the latest news and customer support
content_not_support_audio: This movie has audio which is not supported by BeeTV, please install VLC player to play audio.
update_content:
After update, please uninstall old version. You may need to restore your watchlist in setting. Sorry for the inconvenience!

Release Info
- Version: 2.2.9

- Size: 17MB

- Filelinked code: 30837432



- Add option to choose subtitle color.

- Add 5 link providers.

- Add option to choose watchlist, calendar and collection as default screen.

- Amazon Firestick, FireTV now can use menu button to add movie to watchlist.

- Fix text color and focus color on some devices.
description_player: Best player to work with BeeTV. Less ads and better streaming!
